name: Ethan Punzalan | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
name_original: Ethan Punzalan | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
description: The game revolves around a jumping puzzle type of game, mostly known as parkour games. The game is about a little boy called Timmy. He lost his ball and it somehow ended on top of the mountain. A long the way to the mountain, there are coins that Timmy can get. To win the game Timmy needs to get the ball from the tip of the mountain by jumping on the platforms around the mountain.
